Ngalaba na-ahụ maka ike na ihe onwunwe nke steeti Lagos bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị steeti, nke na-ahụ anya maka ịhazi na itiye n'ọrụ iwu steeti gbasara ike na ihe ndị onwunwe.

E guzobere Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources, nke a maara n'oge gara aga dị ka Office of the Special Adviser on Mineral Resource Development, na July 2011 na ebumnuche nke ịbawanye ikike iji gboo mkpa ọkụ eletrik nke ụmụ amaala.

N'afọ 2020, Lagos kwuru site na ngalaba ya nke ike na akụrụngwa, na nso nso a ya na Eko Innovation Centre jikọrọ aka iji mee ka ụmụ amaala Lagos nwee ike ịnweta mita smart ndị a pụrụ ịdabere na ha na ndị dị ọnụ ala.
Ministri ahụ na-ahụ maka ịkọwapụta, ịkwado, na ịmepụta ụkpụrụ na-adịgide adịgide maka atụmatụ ike iji hụ na ụmụ amaala Lagos niile nwere ike ịnweta ọkụ eletrik a pụrụ ịdabere na ya.
